Author: rapind
Content: I am. S3, SQS, and EC2. It's incredible from a cost perspective. I highly recommend you look into it.

Author: jpdefillippo
Content: I use S3 to store all the high and low res images for JPGmag.com and they have performed amazingly.

Author: olefoo
Content:
There's nothing wrong with being a top-flight employee and helping build something big, but by the time a company has reached a size where two pizzas aren't enough to make everybody full the company has started to settle, the culture is beginning to congeal and the BIG decisions have been made.

If you want to build something insanely great that works the way you think it should you have to pioneer and risk the arrows.

Author: nickb
Title: Microsoft admits recently discovered Windows 2000 flaw exists in XP too
